fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Alley Flash, Skyward Blade, Freedom-Sworn, Prototype Rancour

fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge / ATK % / Elemental Mastery|<goblet>  Pyro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Fantastic Voyage
**2)** Elemental Skill: Passion Overload
**3)** Normal Attack: Strike of Fortune

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
He should meet his ER requirements before investing into other stats. Generally speaking, he should have at least 200% ER, though it may vary between teams.
4p Instructor should only be used early game or for nuke showcases, as 4* artifacts sets have lower main stats, making him less comfortable to use.
